overview: Dean has been living in a movie theater ever since the world ended, spending his days watching movies. His world gets shaken when a group of survivors finds their way into the theater, and he lets them watch his glorious movies with him. Their passivity towards his passion causes Dean to ask the question of which is more important - the movies and the sanctity he loves, or humanity?
tagline: Let's all go to the lobby.
title: Movie Palace
